title: Admin-only section and illustration on User Guide page

requirements.summary: Add an admin-only "For Admins" tab/section to the existing User Guide page, visible only to authenticated admin users.
acceptanceCriteria: When the current user is an admin, the User Guide page shows an additional tab/section labeled "For Admins" alongside the existing Buyer and Seller guides.
When the current user is not an admin (including anonymous users), the Admin guide content is not visible.
All Admin guide headings and body text are written in clear English and follow the same step-by-step style as the Buyer/Seller guides.
The Admin guide includes guidance for at least: accessing admin-only navigation, viewing/updating Company Account/bank details, and understanding admin access restrictions.

file_operations.description: Extend the existing tab UI to conditionally render a third tab labeled "For Admins" using the existing role-based access control plumbing (use the useIsAdmin() hook from the authorization system) so only authenticated admins can see it; keep Buyer/Seller content intact and the /user-guide route unchanged. Add clear step-by-step Admin guide copy covering: (1) how admins access admin-only areas via existing navigation/account entry points, (2) where to view/update Company Account/bank details (reference the existing Company Account page), and (3) what happens when a non-admin attempts to access restricted pages (access restrictions). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a new static admin illustration asset and display it at the top of the Admin guide section with consistent styling and meaningful alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: A new generated image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
When the current user is an admin, the Admin guide section displays the new illustration at the top in a bordered/rounded container consistent with the Buyer/Seller guide sections.
The admin illustration has meaningful alt text in English describing what is shown visually.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static illustration asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/bozarhaat-user-guide-admin.dim_1600x900.png.

In the admin-only "For Admins" tab content, render the illustration from frontend/public/assets/generated/bozarhaat-user-guide-admin.dim_1600x900.png at the top using the same bordered/rounded container pattern as the existing Buyer/Seller illustrations, and provide meaningful English alt text describing the depicted admin workflow. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
